name: RoboHunt
description:
Hi There!

In this world you'll be part of a robot testing experiment for combat. Your objective? Defeat every enemy as fast as you can.

You can be strategic, sneak up to them and kill them in one blow. Or try to shoot them from far away, just remember that they have and advanced AI and will hunt you down once they know your location (by seeing you or hearing you).

CONTROLS:

WASD Keys for movement

Left Shift to Crouch

Spacebar to Jump

Left click to fire your gun

Right Click to make a Melee attack (it KO's Automatically an Enemy, but you need to be super close to them)

Note: This game was made for the Artificial Intelligence in Unreal Engine course for ARKDE

Credits for the game can be seen here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1A86CECGOwpUxc4sKlF43xyvyXHqsYnstohJItxsTnK8/...

Code for the game, if you want to check it out, is here: https://github.com/TheObands1/StealthShooter
